mapper.update:
update t_contract_renewal_intention
archive_id = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_number = #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
intention_status = #{intentionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
contract_begin_date = #{contractBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE},
contract_end_date = #{contractEndDate,jdbcType=DATE},
contract_period_month = #{contractPeriodMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
contract_period_type = #{contractPeriodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_agree = #{isAgree,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
renewal_opinion = #{renewalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where renewal_intention_id = #{renewalIntentionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_contract_renewal_intention set archive_id = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intention_status = #{intentionStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER} contract_number = #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contract_begin_date = #{contractBeginDate,jdbcType=DATE}, contract_end_date = #{contractEndDate,jdbcType=DATE}, contract_period_month = #{contractPeriodMonth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contract_period_type = #{contractPeriodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_agree = #{isAgree,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, renewal_opinion = #{renewalOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where renewal_intention_id = #{renewalIntentionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select arc.user_name as userName, arc.employee_number as employeeNumber , org.org_name as orgName, orga.org_name as bussinessUnitName, post.post_name as postName, intention.update_time as sendTime, intention.renewal_opinion as renewalOpinion, intention.renewal_intention_id as renewalIntentionId, intention.contract_number as contractNumber, intention.intention_status as intentionStatus, intention.company_id as companyId, intention.contract_begin_date as contractBeginDate, intention.contract_end_date as contractEndDate, intention.contract_period_month as contractPeriodMonth, intention.contract_period_type as contractPeriodType, intention.is_agree as isAgree, intention.create_time as createTiem, arch.user_name as sendUser, arc.archive_id as archiveId from t_contract_renewal_intention intention left join t_user_archive arc on arc.archive_id=intention.archive_id and arc.is_delete=0 left join t_organization org on arc.org_id= org.org_id and org.is_enable=1 left join t_organization orga on orga.org_id = arc.business_unit_id and orga.is_enable=1 left join t_post post on post.post_id=arc.post_id and post.is_enable=1 and post.is_delete=0 left join t_user_archive arch on arch.archive_id = intention.operator_id and arch.is_delete=0 where arc.archive_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select arc.user_name as userName, arc.employee_number as employeeNumber , org.org_name as orgName, orga.org_name as bussinessUnitName, post.post_name as postName, intention.update_time as sendTime, intention.renewal_opinion as renewalOpinion, intention.renewal_intention_id as renewalIntentionId, intention.contract_number as contractNumber, intention.intention_status as intentionStatus, intention.company_id as companyId, intention.contract_begin_date as contractBeginDate, intention.contract_end_date as contractEndDate, intention.contract_period_month as contractPeriodMonth, intention.contract_period_type as contractPeriodType, intention.is_agree as isAgree, intention.create_time as createTiem, arch.user_name as sendUser, arc.archive_id as archiveId from t_contract_renewal_intention intention left join t_user_archive arc on arc.archive_id=intention.archive_id and arc.is_delete=0 left join t_organization org on arc.org_id= org.org_id and org.is_enable=1 left join t_organization orga on orga.org_id = arc.business_unit_id and orga.is_enable=1 left join t_post post on post.post_id=arc.post_id and post.is_enable=1 and post.is_delete=0 left join t_user_archive arch on arch.archive_id = intention.operator_id and arch.is_delete=0 where arc.archive_id in (select arc.archive_id from t_user_archive arc left join t_organization org on org.org_id=arc.org_id and org.is_enable=1 and arc.is_delete=0 where org.org_id in
#{item} )
select * from t_contract_renewal_intention intention left join t_user_archive arc on arc.archive_id = intention.archive_id and arc.is_delete=0 where intention.archive_id=#{archiveId}
